resources.string: Scan your luggage to be sure that your luggage fits the maximum dimensions.
Measure your luggage with the cube
Verify if the dimensions are correct
Place your luggage in a bright, open space
Point the camera in front of the luggage and keep it stable
Tap on the luggage to place the measuring cube
Pinch with your fingers to match the cube to the size of the luggage
Check if the cube is exactly the same size as the luggage by moving the camera around it
Press the measure button to verify if the size is allowed
Oopsâ€¦ This bag does not fit the dimensions of TUI Fly.
Perfect! This bag fits the dimensions of TUI Fly.
